text: Azari is another common spelling for Azeri. It may refer to: * anything related to Azerbaijani people ** a native or inhabitant of Iranian Azerbaijan or Azerbaijan Republic, or a person of Azerbaijani descent. ** Old Azeri language, a now extinct Iranic language previously spoken by Azerbaijanis before the adaptation of modern Azerbaijani, a Turkic language ** Azerbaijani language, a Turkic language spoken by Azerbaijani people. ** Azari (magazine), an Iranian Azeri magazine *Āzari, a Persian surname meaning related to Āzar (meaning fire in Persian) ** Azari Tusi *Azari, Khuzestan, a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran *Azari Rural District, an administrative subdivision of North Khorasan Province, Iran * the ancient name of the Catalan village of Vilassar de Dalt ==See also== * Azeri (disambiguation) Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages
title: Azari
